content.raw:
[updated abi check](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/API_ABI%20checker/job/gazebo-any_to_any-abichecker-quantal-amd64/31/)
with following [API_ABI_report](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/API_ABI%20checker/job/gazebo-any_to_any-abichecker-quantal-amd64/31/API_ABI_report/?).  Looks like things are compatible except for the following camera and logging errors unrelated to this pull request?
~~~
Problems with Data Types, Medium Severity (2)
Camera.hh
namespace gazebo::rendering
[+] class Camera (1) 

LogRecord.hh
namespace gazebo::util
[+] class LogRecord::Log (1) 
~~~

content.raw:
[just started one](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/API_ABI%20checker/job/gazebo-any_to_any-abichecker-quantal-amd64/27/)

jenkin failed that one, a new one started automatically [abi build no. 28](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any_to_any-abichecker-quantal-amd64/28/)

after a few jenkins glitches, finally [an API_ABI_report is available now](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/API_ABI%20checker/job/gazebo-any_to_any-abichecker-quantal-amd64/31/API_ABI_report/?)

Looks like things are compatible except for the following camera and logging errors unrelated to this pull request?

Problems with Data Types, Medium Severity (2)

[+] class Camera (1) 

LogRecord.hh

[+] class LogRecord::Log (1) 
~~~

update.title: ODE Dynamic Inertia Modification (#895)

content.raw:
The comment isn't 100% clear to me. How does the following change sound:
~~~
diff -r 0ca3fc202082 deps/opende/src/quickstep.cpp
--- a/deps/opende/src/quickstep.cpp	Thu Nov 07 09:52:33 2013 -0800
+++ b/deps/opende/src/quickstep.cpp	Thu Nov 07 10:18:23 2013 -0800
@@ -1453,9 +1453,9 @@
 };
 
 //***************************************************************************
-// Mofifying inertia without modifying dynamics,
-// Except in the case where moment of inertia modification makes the system unstable,
-// diagonal terms are increased to make moi diagonally dominant.
+// Modifying inertia without modifying dynamics,
+// Unless moment of inertia modification makes the system unstable,
+// in which case, diagonal terms are increased to make moi diagonally dominant.
 static void DYNAMIC_INERTIA(const int infom, const dxJoint::Info2 &Jinfo, const int b1, const int b2,
                             const dJointWithInfo1 *jicurr,
                             dRealMutablePtr invMOI, dRealMutablePtr MOI)
~~~
content.html:
The comment isn't 100% clear to me. How does the following change sound:

diff -r 0ca3fc202082 deps/opende/src/quickstep.cpp
--- a/deps/opende/src/quickstep.cpp Thu Nov 07 09:52:33 2013 -0800
+++ b/deps/opende/src/quickstep.cpp Thu Nov 07 10:18:23 2013 -0800
@@ -1453,9 +1453,9 @@
 };

 //***************************************************************************
-// Mofifying inertia without modifying dynamics,
-// Except in the case where moment of inertia modification makes the system unstable,
-// diagonal terms are increased to make moi diagonally dominant.
+// Modifying inertia without modifying dynamics,
+// Unless moment of inertia modification makes the system unstable,
+// in which case, diagonal terms are increased to make moi diagonally dominant.
 static void DYNAMIC_INERTIA(const int infom, const dxJoint::Info2 &Jinfo, const int b1, const int b2,
                             const dJointWithInfo1 *jicurr,
                             dRealMutablePtr invMOI, dRealMutablePtr MOI)
